list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster =~ /^contrail/

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from openstack_check_local_api with key = hostname where environment_label =~ /^$environment$/ and service =~ /^contrail/
